Articles.Content:
This is my replica of the Orion Capsule on the Delta IV Heavy rocket.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The only mods I used where Mechjeb and Sum Dum Heavy Industries.

Sum Dum is mainly used for the capsule and you will need to download all the other mods listed in the Sum Dum post.

This rocket has easily enough Delta V to make it to the moon and back.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/48357-WIP-Sum-Dum-Heavy-Industries-Service-Module-System-%28Stockalike%29

Download:

https://www./?e8g7ol5l37nztk2

Edited December 8, 2014 by Jackvony
Also if you like this please ask for a replica. I am looking for some work to do!
